collections.comments: Q5. Find amenities for a room
Q4. Find available rooms by hotel / date
Q2. Find information about a hotel
Q1. Find hotels near given poi
Q3. Find pois near a hotel
Q7. Find reservations by hotel and date
Q8. Find reservations by guest name

UDFs.name: count_if_true
UDFs.functionBody:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION count_if_true ( input boolean )
			RETURNS NULL ON NULL INPUT
			RETURNS int   
			LANGUAGE java AS
			$$ if (input) return 1; else return 0; $$ ;

UDFs.name: state_count_if_true
UDFs.functionBody:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION state_count_if_true ( total int, input boolean )
			RETURNS NULL ON NULL INPUT
			RETURNS int   
			LANGUAGE java AS
			$$ if (input) return total+1; else return total; $$ ;

UDAs.name: total_available
UDAs.storedProcFunction:
CREATE AGGREGATE  total_available (boolean)
			SFUNC state_count_if_true
			STYPE int
			INITCOND 0
			;

description:

From Chapter 5 of "Cassandra: the Definitive Guide"
